attributes.action: End Transgender Discrimination and Harassment in Wiltshire Probation Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following Mr Chris Wheeler's retirement as Chief Officer I suffered 5+ years of alternating hostility, neglect, abuse and downright vitriol just because I am a disabled transgendered woman.  I suffered deep depression and remain unemployed some three years after being ousted from the job I truly loved and was good at (Home Office inspection etc.)  They finally sacked me after causing me so much distress and I lost an Employment Tribunal.  They lied. They connived.  Please! stop it.

rejection.details:
We may not accept petitions that give extensive accounts of alleged wrongdoing - we are not arbiters of disputes and we are not in a position to corroborate any form of allegation.
Please amend so that your petition is a simple call to action.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
